amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC. ___. None of the funds made available under this Act may be used for the Third Street Light Rail Phase 2 Central Subway project in San Francisco, California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the Third Street Light Rail Phase 2 Central Subway project in San Francisco, California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 186 (Roll no. 446).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 186 (Roll no. 446).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. McClintock.
